Introduction
This topic contains information on initial awards to dependents, including
determining the effective date when death occurs during service
, and
handling claims
when all dependents do not apply
, and
in which the claimant is awarded less than the full rate
.
title: M21-1, Part XII, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section A - Dependency and Indemnity Compensation (DIC) Initial Authorization Issues
citation: Part XII, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section A
